title: Disco Is Back. And So Is Donna Summer.
description: Disco is back. And so is Donna Summer. But the singer’s transcendence doesn’t stop at disco.
dc:creator: Wesley Morris, Jenna Wortham, Elyssa Dudley, Hans Buetow, Christina Djossa, Sasha Weiss and Marion Lozano
media:credit: Photo Illustration by The New York Times. Photo by Harry Langdon/Getty Images
